reviewText: The Film OVER THE HEDGE & It's Bonus DVD HAMMY'S NUTTY FUN is Family Fun For Everyone. The Voices in OVER THE HEDGE, Which Include Action Star Bruce Willis (From Die Hard), and Steve Carrel (From The Office - Season One) Just To Name A Few, Are Great At Thier Roles and Are Very Belivable As Thier Carecters. The Animation is Belivable, as Well, From the Forrest, To Vincent The Bear's Cave, and Saberbia. The Villians in The Film Are Brilliant and Origanal, and Very Evil. The film is Fun For Everyone. The Spiecial Features in The DVD are Great Including A Making of, Games and More. HAMMY'S NUTTY FUN Isn't The Best DVD To Come Included With The Film's DVD, But Alot Like The Film, The DVD is Absolut Family Fun For Everyone. HAMMY'S NUTTY FUN Includes HAMMY DANCE, HAMMY'S BOOMERANG ADVENTURE, & More. Overall Ratings: Movie-4/5 Bonus DVD-4/5
